scripts.cleanbuild: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build
scripts.changelog:commit: prettier -w CHANGELOG.md && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'docs: Update CHANGELOG.md'
scripts.release:major: pnpm changelog:major && pnpm changelog:commit && pnpm version major
scripts.release:minor: pnpm changelog:minor && pnpm changelog:commit && pnpm version minor
scripts.release:patch: pnpm changelog:patch && pnpm changelog:commit && pnpm version patch
